title: Bug 40693Text  No Verify/Modify when a modifier key is down
description: Eclipse 3.0M2It's not possible to create classpath variables with underscores. The dialog displays the errormessage "A variable name must be entered". When you remove the underscore and readd it, themessage has disappeared but the created classpath variable will not be created as specified.Sometimes the underscore is missing, sometimes characters at the end of the variable.
